document_data.name: Lightning Storm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lightning storm''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s.{{Cite dragon/200/The Wizards Three: Once more the three|24-25}}
document_data.Effects: This spell created a series of lightning strikes within a sphere measuring {{SI|70|ft|long=yes}} in diameter. The magic of the spell kept the lightning from reaching beyond the edge of the sphere. Any creature within the sphere, with the exception of the caster, was hit repeatedly with savage lightning strikes. The caster was also immune to any other electrical-based attack while their ''lightning storm'' was active.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a shard of glass, a scrap of fur, a flint, and a piece of [[silver]] to cast.
